description:
Welcome to the course on "Permutation and Combination"

In this course you will learn about

  • 1)The difference between permutation and combination
  • 2)How to identify the problem
  • 3)Permutation in detail with examples
  • 4)Combination in detail with examples
  • 5)Practice test at the end of each section to test your understanding

In permutation and combination problems it is very important to recognize the type of problem. Many students mistakenly approach a combination problem as permutation and vice-versa.

This course will help you to improve your understanding and to differentiate permutation and combination problem with ease. This course will also teach you short-cut methods to solve problems based on permutation and combination using formulas. Take this course to have better clarity on the subject and to solve problems based on this quickly.
title: Permutation and Combination
